text: getting a hands-on job experience is
important and I didn't really get that
until I started working on my third job
of HBS which was with estee lauder i
worked in probably like six different
countries behind the counter to really
learn the operational side of the
business as well as what it is to be a
brand and that was extremely important
for me it was the most invaluable lesson
for me and I think that was what carried
me into general management on the career
going forward so if the women are
interested in getting to the general
management I think a hands-on experience
